item.title: Canadian Apprenticeship Longitudinal Indicators: Interactive Tool
item.description: We - together with my colleagues Chaoyang and Anouk - created this interactive data visulization tool based on Shiny. Check out at Statistics Canada’s website: English version La version française All programs are available on this GitHub repository.
